com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class LineStyle

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.LineStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LineStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class is used to define a line style. Contains line width and color.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
LineStyle(int width, Color color)
          Creates a new line style.
 
Method Summary
 Color getColor()
          Returns the line color.
 int getWidth()
          Returns the line width in twips (1/20 px).
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

LineStyle

public LineStyle(int width,
                 Color color)
Creates a new line style. Specify the width of the line in twips (1/20 px) and the line color, which can be an RGBA or an RGB instance depending on whether the tag the line style is contained in supports transparency or not (DefineShape3 supports transparency).

Parameters:
width - line width
color - line color
See Also:
DefineShape3
Method Detail

public Color getColor()
Returns the line color.

line color

getWidth

public int getWidth()
Returns the line width in twips (1/20 px).

Returns:
line width in twips
